page.title: 11HOME LIFE IN WOODLAND A.M.
page.content: Sunday morning 8.30.Got up and went to the{bathroom,}washed and cleaned my teeth. The bath is under the window next to the sink.A step goes up to the toilet which is next to the radiator.After washing I dressed,put on my jeans,white blouse,and trainers, went downstairs for{breakfast.}I had a bowl of Kellogs Frosties.After I had finished I went to Rebecca's on my bike.Rebecca is my best friend and lives at the other end of the{village. We messed about in the village that morning while we watched the Beamish Rally,which is an endurance test for vintage cars and motorbikes. The rally finished going through Woodland about 12.00 Noon,I went down home for{dinner.}I had meat,potatoes, vegetables and yorkshire puddings.Mam cooked these in the electric oven and micro-wave oven.
